name: AIOStreams
author: viren070 + Runtipi community
description: Aggregate and filter multiple Stremio addons and debrid services in one addon.
short_desc: Unified Stremio addon interface with advanced filtering.

form_fields.label: Addon Name
form_fields.hint: Set the display name of the addon.

form_fields.label: Addon ID
form_fields.hint: Unique identifier for the addon.

form_fields.label: Deterministic Addon ID
form_fields.hint: Generate a deterministic addon ID based on config; useful for multiple installs.

form_fields.label: Port
form_fields.hint: Port on which the addon listens.

form_fields.label: Secret Key (64-hex chars)
form_fields.hint: 64-char hex string to encrypt config; generate via openssl rand -hex 32.

form_fields.label: API Key (for regex filters)
form_fields.hint: API key for installing/using the addon; leave blank to disable.

form_fields.label: Show Dice Emoji
form_fields.hint: Show a dice emoji in stream results.

form_fields.label: Log Level
form_fields.hint: Log verbosity: debug, info, warn, error.

form_fields.label: Log Format
form_fields.hint: Log output format: json or text.

form_fields.label: Log Sensitive Info
form_fields.hint: Whether to log sensitive details like API keys.

form_fields.label: Addon Proxy URL
form_fields.hint: Proxy URL for upstream addon requests when needed.

form_fields.label: Proxy Rules
form_fields.hint: Comma-separated domain:boolean proxy rules; wildcards supported.

form_fields.label: Max Addons
form_fields.hint: Max number of addons per instance.

form_fields.label: Max Keyword Filters
form_fields.hint: Max keyword filters allowed.

form_fields.label: Max Regex Sort Patterns
form_fields.hint: Max regex patterns for sorting.

form_fields.label: Max Movie Size (bytes)
form_fields.hint: Upper byte limit for movie size slider.

form_fields.label: Max Episode Size (bytes)
form_fields.hint: Upper byte limit for episode size slider.

form_fields.label: Max Override Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Maximum overrideable timeout in ms.

form_fields.label: Min Override Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Minimum overrideable timeout in ms.

form_fields.label: Default Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Default request timeout if not overridden.

form_fields.label: Default Regex Exclude Pattern
form_fields.hint: Regex between single quotes to exclude streams, e.g. '/b(0neshot)\b'.

form_fields.label: Default Regex Include Pattern
form_fields.hint: Regex between single quotes to include streams, e.g. '/b(3L)\b'.

form_fields.label: Default Regex Sort Patterns
form_fields.hint: Single-quoted regex patterns for custom sort order.

form_fields.label: MediaFlow IP Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for fetching IP from MediaFlow before error.

form_fields.label: Default MediaFlow URL
form_fields.hint: Default MediaFlow URL, forces use if set.

form_fields.label: Default MediaFlow API Password
form_fields.hint: API password for default MediaFlow instance.

form_fields.label: Default MediaFlow Public IP
form_fields.hint: Public IP for default MediaFlow instance.

form_fields.label: Encrypt MediaFlow URLs
form_fields.hint: Encrypt MediaFlow URLs for external player compatibility.

form_fields.label: StremThru Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for requests to StremThru instance.

form_fields.label: Default StremThru URL
form_fields.hint: Default StremThru URL, forces use if set.

form_fields.label: Default StremThru Credential
form_fields.hint: Credential (plain or base64) for default StremThru.

form_fields.label: Default StremThru Public IP
form_fields.hint: Public IP for default StremThru.

form_fields.label: Encrypt StremThru URLs
form_fields.hint: Encrypt StremThru URLs for external player compatibility.

form_fields.label: Comet URL
form_fields.hint: Base Comet API URL; must end with trailing slash.

form_fields.label: Default Comet Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Default timeout for Comet API requests.

form_fields.label: Force Comet Hostname
form_fields.hint: Public hostname for internal Comet URL configurations.

form_fields.label: Force Comet Port
form_fields.hint: Public port for internal Comet URL configurations.

form_fields.label: Force Comet Protocol
form_fields.hint: Public protocol (http/https) for internal Comet.

form_fields.label: MediaFusion URL
form_fields.hint: Base MediaFusion URL; must end with trailing slash.

form_fields.label: Default MediaFusion Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for MediaFusion requests.

form_fields.label: MediaFusion Config Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for /encrypt-user-data endpoint.

form_fields.label: MediaFusion API Password
form_fields.hint: API password for MediaFusion instance.

form_fields.label: JackettIO URL
form_fields.hint: Base JackettIO URL; must end with trailing slash.

form_fields.label: Default JackettIO Indexers (JSON)
form_fields.hint: JSON array of default JackettIO indexers.

form_fields.label: Default JackettIO Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for JackettIO API requests.

form_fields.label: Default JackettIO StremThru URL
form_fields.hint: Default StremThru proxy for JackettIO.

form_fields.label: Force JackettIO Hostname
form_fields.hint: Public hostname for internal JackettIO URLs.

form_fields.label: Force JackettIO Port
form_fields.hint: Public port for internal JackettIO URLs.

form_fields.label: Force JackettIO Protocol
form_fields.hint: Public protocol for internal JackettIO URLs.

form_fields.label: Stremio-Jackett URL
form_fields.hint: Base URL for Stremio-Jackett addon; trailing slash required.

form_fields.label: Default Stremio-Jackett's Jackett URL
form_fields.hint: URL of upstream Jackett instance for Stremio-Jackett.

form_fields.label: Default Stremio-Jackett's Jackett API Key
form_fields.hint: API key for upstream Jackett in Stremio-Jackett config.

form_fields.label: Default Stremio-Jackett TMDB API Key
form_fields.hint: TMDB API key for metadata in Stremio-Jackett.

form_fields.label: Default Stremio-Jackett Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for Stremio-Jackett API requests.

form_fields.label: StremThru Store URL
form_fields.hint: URL for StremThru store addon; trailing slash required.

form_fields.label: StremThru Store Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for StremThru store addon.

form_fields.label: Torrentio URL
form_fields.hint: URL for Torrentio addon; trailing slash required.

form_fields.label: Default Torrentio Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for Torrentio API requests.

form_fields.label: TorBox Stremio URL
form_fields.hint: URL for TorBox addon; trailing slash required.

form_fields.label: Default TorBox Stremio Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for TorBox addon requests.

form_fields.label: Peerflix URL
form_fields.hint: URL for Peerflix addon; trailing slash required.

form_fields.label: Default Peerflix Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for Peerflix addon requests.

form_fields.label: Easynews+ URL
form_fields.hint: URL for Easynews+ addon; trailing slash required.

form_fields.label: Default Easynews+ Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for Easynews+ addon.

form_fields.label: Easynews++ URL
form_fields.hint: URL for Easynews++ addon; trailing slash required.

form_fields.label: Default Easynews++ Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for Easynews++ addon.

form_fields.label: Orion Stremio Addon URL
form_fields.hint: URL for Orion addon; trailing slash required.

form_fields.label: Default Orion Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for Orion addon.

form_fields.label: Easynews URL
form_fields.hint: URL for Easynews addon; trailing slash required.

form_fields.label: Default Easynews Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for Easynews addon.

form_fields.label: Debridio URL
form_fields.hint: URL for Debridio addon; trailing slash required.

form_fields.label: Default Debridio Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for Debridio addon.

form_fields.label: Default DMM Cast Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for DMM Cast addon.

form_fields.label: Default Stremio GDrive Timeout (ms)
form_fields.hint: Timeout for GDrive addon.
